/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the top right corner, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.

On either side of the street, there are lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. The buildings on the right side of the street are made of brick, their red and brown hues contrasting with the greenery. On the left side, there's a white building, its stark color standing out against the more muted tones of the brick buildings.

The street itself is paved with gray asphalt, and there's a sidewalk running parallel to it. A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day under the bright sun. The image beautifully encapsulates a typical day in Beijing, with its blend of urban architecture and natural beauty.
